module.name: document_properties
module.purpose: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the assignment of properties to a particular representation of a document version.

inscope.li: Assignment of properties to a particular representation of a document version.

outscope.li: Identification of documents and versions of documents;
Assignment of properties to a particular representation of a product version.

uof.name: Document_Properties
uof.description: The Document_Properties UoF specifies the definitional information for the concept of properties to Documents, relevant to a particular definition.
